titleStmt.title: The speech of Francis Lovelace, Esquire, recorder of the city of Canterbvry to His Majestie King Charles the Second, upon his arrivall to Kent, and coming to Canturbury that day he landed, being the 25th day of May, 1660, and in the twelth year of his reign over England & c.
titleStmt.author: Lovelace, Francis, 1594-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Griffin for Matthew Walbancke,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
